reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's fit, quality, and style, particularly appreciating its beautiful knitted pattern. Customers find it perfect for colder weather, with one mentioning it's ideal for temperatures in the low 50s.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and Soft, Thick quality
items.body: Fit perfect, very pretty and vibrant if not better (just like the picture) feels good, good quality, well made, , soft and comfortable. I will order other colors. üòä My only problem is that it only came in a clear package. Not the clear package along with the Amazon package. Just the clear package by itself just laying in the mail room where everyone could see what I purchased. Tip: Please secure these packages better. More discretely. It‚Äôs the Holidays and people do steal. You could see the pretty sweater right through the clear packaging. Read more
items.author: Very good body cream leaving skin so soft as it firms , and tightens your skin. While leaving your body smelling deliciously good. I have been using this cream since it first launched back in 2015.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality that shows in person
items.body: This is a beautiful, heavy sweater. True to size and the colors are exactly as pictured. I bought this in light blue, forest green and cream. Perfectly soft and warm, it‚Äôs stretch but doesn‚Äôt lose its shape. A good price. I plan to keep and wear these for years to come. Read more
items.author: L. Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!
items.body: This is one of my favorite sweaters. In fact, I have purchased 3 different colors. It is a heavyweight, warm sweater that is fitted. I am 5'2", 115 lbs, and a small hits me low on the hips. The colors are vibrant, and the fabric holds up to gentle washing. I lay it flat for drying--so far, no pilling or pulled threads. Looks great dressed up with slacks or a skirt or with a simple pair of jeans. Read more
items.author: Okie Mama

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: The sweater cable pattern is very nice and the fabric is quite soft. It is a mid-weight sweater, not thin but not super heavy. It looks great with dress pants or jeans. I ordered the white and the material is thick enough that your undergarments are not visible. The reason for the four stars is that, as some other reviewers, mine came with a small hole in the seam of one arm. I was able to sew it closed but should not have to do that for a new sweater. I really do like the sweater and also ordered one in purple which came in good condition. Just be aware there is some size variation that can occur. I ordered the white in a small. It fit really well but because the sweater is slim my "love handles" showed a little. I was contemplating getting the purple in a medium but ordered it in small as well. The small purple is a little bigger in the shoulders and body and is not quite as slim as the white. I'm glad I did not order the size up. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Versatile!
items.body: This is the best sweater EVER! I bought it in Medium in the Blush Pink color. (I'm 5'7" and 130 lbs) and it fit's perfectly. Very comfortable. Then I came back and bought this red. This color is gorgeous! This time I got it in XL to wear with leggings. My goal is to have it in several colors in multiple sizes. Best clothing purchase I've made on Amazon! Read more
items.author: G. N.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST sweaters ever!
items.body: I absolutely love these V28 sweaters! So cozy and warm but, more than that, fit so well! For reference, I am 5 foot 1 and 105 lbs. The XS fits beautifully. I have bought so many colors and different styles of this brand over the years and I am never disappointed! They wash well and never lose their shape. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: lisab

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Gorgeous knit pattern and color. Nice yarn quality, too. Very comfy! Read more
items.author: Richard G Fields

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dressy cold weather sweater
items.body: This is a sweater for colder weather. The material is unique. A bit shiny and unlike any other sweaters in my closet. The brown color is rich. It is a trim fitting sweater without being clingy. Perfect for those buyers who prefer a petite sizing. Definitely not a ‚Äúchunky style‚Äù sweater. Comfortable and warm. Fits just below hip but can easily be tucked under for a shorter look. Read more
items.author: NRH

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Jadeblue, Dark Grey, Black, Camel, Babyblue, Coffee, Plum, Morandi Pink, Beige, Rouge, Blue, Berry, Hot Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
